
```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg, mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = drv))+

```
```{r}

```
```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg, mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))+
  geom_smooth(data = filter(mpg, class == "subcompact"),
              se = FALSE)+
  geom_point(mapping = aes(color = class))
```
